name: KMOD: Premium Edition
description:
Welcome to KMOD: Platinum Edition

KMod stands for "Kai's MODular interface", Originally named KMODG, it's a user-generated application with a framework for creating simple first-person modifications. 

It contains half-life inspired movement, realistic beans (somewhat) a user-interface,

and many more features. As the game gets updated, more API functions will be exposed, allowing more complex addons to be made. 

Repository: thekaigonzalez/ModRepo: KMOD addon repository. (github.com)

It's currently in SUPER EARLY ACCESS, SO EVERYTHING IS SUBJECT TO CHANGE!!!!
